metadata.title: CVE-2024-0149 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability which couldallow an attacker unauthorized access to files. A successful exploit ofthis vulnerability might lead to limited information disclosure.
